story:
Once upon a time, in a vast snowy forest in Russia, there lived a brave young bear named Dmitri. Dmitri was known throughout the forest for his kind heart and adventurous spirit.

One cold winter evening, as the snowflakes fell gently from the sky, Dmitri found himself wandering deep into the forest. As he walked, he heard a faint cry for help coming from behind a large oak tree. Curious and concerned, Dmitri hurried towards the sound.

There, he found a little squirrel named Ivan trapped under a fallen tree branch. Without hesitation, Dmitri pried the branch away and helped Ivan to his feet. The grateful squirrel thanked Dmitri and explained that he had been gathering nuts when the branch fell.

Dmitri smiled warmly at Ivan and invited him to join him on his journey through the forest. Together, they ventured deeper into the woods, sharing stories and laughter along the way.

As night fell and the forest grew dark, Dmitri and Ivan found themselves at the edge of a frozen lake. The moonlight shimmered on the ice, casting a magical glow over the trees. Dmitri and Ivan sat side by side, watching the stars twinkle above them.

With a yawn, Ivan nestled into Dmitri's fur, feeling safe and warm by his side. Dmitri gazed up at the sky, knowing that no matter how vast the forest or how dark the night, he would always be there to protect his new friend.

And so, under the watchful gaze of the moon and stars, Dmitri and Ivan drifted off to sleep, their dreams filled with friendship and adventure.

And in the morning, as the sun rose over the forest, they woke up to a new day of endless possibilities and endless friendship.

The end. Goodnight, little one. Sweet dreams.
